name: Other Side of the Alley
description:
You found yourself at the boundary between life and death, the overseer of the boundary gives you one chance to navigate and find your way out by collect enough wisps. Survive by tricking the entities with your mask, remember to keep track of your hunger and eat!

Controls:

Arrow Keys [Move]

1 [No Mask]

2 [Spirit Mask]

3 [Guard Mask]

4 [Zombie Mask]

Q [Enter/Exit Doors]

Space [Talk to NPC]
